div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1148 Crimea, Ukraine?, 1945-1965 Burial: 47-44 B.C. Contents: 36 AE Panticapaeum: 20 AE (as Minns, pl. 6, 11) Unc. Bosporus: 7 AE (as Minns, pl. 9, 21) Asander: 2 AE (as Minns, pl. 6, 25) Unc.: 7 AE Disposition: Kerch' (Hist.-Arch. Mus.) Golenko, NSf 1965, p. 45
